Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Alhambra \Al*ham"bra\, n. [Ultimately fr. Ar. al the + hamr[=a] red; i. e., the red (sc. house).] The palace of the Moorish kings at Granada. [1913 Webster]
Alhambra n : a palace and fortress built in Granada by the Muslims in the Middle Ages
